Param.name: CnlMult
Param.descr: Multiplicity of the first channel of a device

Param.name: CnlShift
Param.descr: Shift of the first channel of a device

Param.name: CnlGap
Param.descr: Gap between channel numbers of different devices

Param.name: PrependDeviceName
Param.descr: To prepend a device name in channel names
